servinfo.title: Rear End door Window Defogger Symptom Diagnosis

item.ptxt: Use of SUZUKI scan tool makes it easy to check whether a faulty condition is on the input side or output side of BCM. For checking procedure, refer to “Diagnosis Using Output Test Function of SUZUKI Scan Tool” under Scan Tool Data .
Check each part in the order from the top of the following list.

condition.ptxt: Rear end door window defogger does not operate

action.ptxt: Replace fuse and check for short circuit.

ps.ptxt: Rear end door window defogger relay faulty

action.ptxt: Check rear end door window defogger relay referring to Rear End Door Window Defogger Relay Inspection .
Check defogger wire referring to Rear End Door Window Defogger Wire Inspection .
Check HVAC control module referring to HVAC Control Module and Its Circuits Inspection .
Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.
